activities: ExecOnline provides your organization with access to elite institutions that each offer world-class instruction across a range of subject areas. We give you the ability to work with multiple schools in one of their recognized areas of strength, while also providing uniformity and excellence for the organization and the learner. The information collected from the client is used to create a profile that is used to provide educational services in conjunction with institutions of higher learning.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: SALUTATION;FIRST NAME;LAST NAME;TITLE;HOW MANY YEARS HAVE YOU BEEN IN THIS POSITION?;WORK EMAIL;PHONE NUMBER;MOBILE PHONE NUMBER;COUNTRY OF ORIGIN;CURRENT LOCATION COUNTRY;CURRENT LOCATION STATE;CITY;PRIMARY TIME ZONE;WHICH LEVEL BEST DESCRIBES YOUR POSITION;WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST DESCRIBES YOUR FUNCTION?
recoursemech: ExecOnline will cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
